QuestData.Title: Dangerous Game
QuestData.Description:
Most of these Horde don't scare us, but we lost two people today to a group of forsaken keenblades. We've had trouble tracking them down, we could really use your help.
They're stealthy and dangerous fighters, so show no mercy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rid the hills of these Forsaken Keenblades.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need your help getting rid of these keenblades.
QuestData.RewardText: Your skills are impressive. I don't think any of us could have taken out those keenblades so easily.
